 29namespace vsip
 30{
 31namespace impl
 32{
 33namespace fft
 34{
 35
 36template <typename InT,
 37	  typename OutT>
 38struct Select_fft_size
 39{
 40  static length_type exec(length_type /*in_size*/, length_type out_size)
 41  { return out_size; }
 42};
 43
 44template <typename T>
 45struct Select_fft_size<T, std::complex<T> >
 46{
 47  static length_type exec(length_type in_size, length_type /*out_size*/)
 48  { return in_size; }
 49};
 50
 51template <typename InT,
 52	  typename OutT>
 53inline length_type
 54select_fft_size(length_type in_size, length_type out_size)
 55{
 56  return Select_fft_size<InT, OutT>::exec(in_size, out_size);
 57}
 58
 59
 60
 61/// This provides the temporary data as well as the
 62/// conversion logic from blocks to arrays as expected
 63/// by fft backends.
 64template <dimension_type D, typename I, typename O>
 65class Ct_workspace;
 66
 67template <typename InT,
 68	  typename OutT>
 69class Ct_workspace<1, InT, OutT>
 70{
 71  typedef typename Scalar_of<OutT>::type scalar_type;
 72
 73public:
 74  template <typename BE>
 75  Ct_workspace(BE* /*backend*/, Domain<1> const &in, Domain<1> const &out,
 76	       scalar_type scale)
 77    : scale_(scale),
 78      input_buffer_(in.size()),
 79      output_buffer_(out.size())
 80  {
 81  }
 82  
 83  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
 84  void out_of_place(BE *backend,
 85		    const_Vector<InT, Block0>& in,
 86		    Vector<OutT, Block1>& out)
 87  {
 88    {
 89      Ext_data<Block0> in_ext (in.block(),  SYNC_IN);
 90      Ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), SYNC_OUT);
 91
 92      backend->out_of_place(
 93		in_ext.data(),  in_ext.stride(0),
 94		out_ext.data(), out_ext.stride(0),
 95		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(0), out_ext.size(0)));
 96    }
 97
 98    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 99    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
100      out *= scale_;
101  }
102
103  template <typename BE, typename BlockT>
104  void in_place(BE *backend, Vector<OutT, BlockT> inout)
105  {
106    {
107      // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if
108      // necessary.
109      Ext_data<BlockT> inout_ext(inout.block(), SYNC_INOUT); // input_buffer_.get());
110    
111      // Call the backend.
112      backend->in_place(inout_ext.data(),
113			inout_ext.stride(0), inout_ext.size(0));
114    }
115    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
116    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
117      inout *= scale_;
118  }
119
120private:
121  scalar_type scale_;
122  aligned_array<InT> input_buffer_;
123  aligned_array<OutT> output_buffer_;
124};
125
126
127
128template <typename InT,
129	  typename OutT>
130class Ct_workspace<2, InT, OutT>
131{
132  typedef typename Scalar_of<OutT>::type scalar_type;
133
134public:
135  template <typename BE>
136  Ct_workspace(BE* /*backend*/, Domain<2> const &in, Domain<2> const &out,
137	       scalar_type scale)
138    : scale_(scale),
139      input_buffer_(in.size()),
140      output_buffer_(out.size())
141  {
142  }
143  
144  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
145  void out_of_place(BE *backend,
146		    const_Matrix<InT, Block0> in,
147		    Matrix<OutT, Block1> out)
148  {
149    {
150      Ext_data<Block0> in_ext (in.block(),  SYNC_IN);
151      Ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), SYNC_OUT);
152
153      backend->out_of_place(
154		in_ext.data(),  in_ext.stride(0),  in_ext.stride(1),
155		out_ext.data(), out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
156		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(0), out_ext.size(0)),
157		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(1), out_ext.size(1)));
158    }
159
160    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
161    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
162      out *= scale_;
163  }
164
165  template <typename BE, typename BlockT>
166  void in_place(BE *backend, Matrix<OutT, BlockT> inout)
167  {
168    {
169      // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if
170      // necessary.
171      Ext_data<BlockT> inout_ext(inout.block(), SYNC_INOUT); // FIXME (split): input_buffer_.get());
172    
173      // Call the backend.
174      backend->in_place(inout_ext.data(),
175			inout_ext.stride(0), inout_ext.stride(1),
176			inout_ext.size(0), inout_ext.size(1));
177    }
178    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
179    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
180      inout *= scale_;
181  }
182
183private:
184  scalar_type scale_;
185  aligned_array<InT> input_buffer_;
186  aligned_array<OutT> output_buffer_;
187};
188
189
190template <typename InT,
191	  typename OutT>
192class Ct_workspace<3, InT, OutT>
193{
194  typedef typename Scalar_of<OutT>::type scalar_type;
195
196public:
197  template <typename BE>
198  Ct_workspace(BE* /*backend*/, Domain<3> const &in, Domain<3> const &out,
199	       scalar_type scale)
200    : scale_(scale),
201      input_buffer_(in.size()),
202      output_buffer_(out.size())
203  {
204  }
205  
206  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
207  void out_of_place(BE *backend,
208		    const_Tensor<InT, Block0> in,
209		    Tensor<OutT, Block1> out)
210  {
211    {
212      Ext_data<Block0> in_ext (in.block(),  SYNC_IN);
213      Ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), SYNC_OUT);
214
215      backend->out_of_place(
216		in_ext.data(), 
217		in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1), in_ext.stride(2),
218		out_ext.data(),
219		out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1), out_ext.stride(2),
220		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(0), out_ext.size(0)),
221		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(1), out_ext.size(1)),
222		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(2), out_ext.size(2)));
223    }
224
225    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
226    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
227      out *= scale_;
228  }
229
230  template <typename BE, typename BlockT>
231  void in_place(BE *backend, Vector<OutT, BlockT> inout)
232  {
233    {
234      // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if
235      // necessary.
236      Ext_data<BlockT> inout_ext(inout.block(), SYNC_INOUT,
237				 input_buffer_.get());
238    
239      // Call the backend.
240      backend->in_place(
241		inout_ext.data(),
242		inout_ext.stride(0), inout_ext.stride(1), inout_ext.stride(2),
243		inout_ext.size(0), inout_ext.size(1), inout_ext.size(2));
244    }
245    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
246    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
247      inout *= scale_;
248  }
249
250private:
251  scalar_type scale_;
252  aligned_array<InT> input_buffer_;
253  aligned_array<OutT> output_buffer_;
254};
